```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
r00_full_repeated_by_phase <- read_rds("output/r00_full_repeated_by_phase.rds")
```

```{r}
summary_primary_stoves <- r00_full_repeated_by_phase %>% 
  summarise(mean(sums_temp38_events, na.rm = TRUE), mean(sums_temp38_percent, na.rm = TRUE), 
            mean(sums_temp40_events, na.rm = TRUE), mean(sums_temp40_percent, na.rm = TRUE), 
            mean(sums_temp45_events, na.rm = TRUE), mean(sums_temp45_percent, na.rm = TRUE), 
            median(sums_temp38_events, na.rm = TRUE), median(sums_temp38_percent, na.rm = TRUE), 
            median(sums_temp40_events, na.rm = TRUE), median(sums_temp40_percent, na.rm = TRUE), 
            median(sums_temp45_events, na.rm = TRUE), median(sums_temp45_percent, na.rm = TRUE))
```
